briefTitle: A Study Investigating the Immunologic Effects and Safety of 60-day Treatment of the ALK HDM Tablets in Adult Subjects With HDM-Induced Allergic Rhinitis and/or Atopic Asthma
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study Investigating the Immunologic Effects and Safety of 60-day Treatment of the ALK HDM Tablets in Adult Subjects With Allergic Rhinitis and/or Atopic Asthma Induced by House Dust Mites
summary: To demonstrate superiority of ALK HDM tablets versus placebo in immune response, measured as change of D.farinae specific immunoglobulin G4 (IgG4) from baseline to end of treatment with ALK HDM tablets given once daily over 60 days.

primaryOutcome.measure: D. Farinae Specific IgG4 Change From Baseline to End of Treatment

commonTop: Oral soft tissue signs and symptoms
Upper raspiratory tract signs and symptoms
